Name: amtd
Overview: Automated Movie Trailer Downloader :: AMTD is a Radarr Companion script to automatically download movie trailers for use in media applications

enableautomaticscriptstart.Name: Enable Automatic Script Start
enableautomaticscriptstart.Description: true = Enabled :: Runs script automatically on startup

scriptinterval.Name: Script Interval
scriptinterval.Description: #s or #m or #h or #d :: s = seconds, m = minutes, h = hours, d = days :: Amount of time between each script run, when AUTOSTART is enabled

radarrurl.Name: Radarr Url
radarrurl.Description: Set domain or IP to your Radarr instance including port. If using reverse proxy, do not use a trailing slash. Ensure you specify http/s...

extrastype.Name: Extras Type
extrastype.Description: all or trailers :: all downloads all available videos (trailers, clips, featurettes, etc...) :: trailers only downloads trailers

extrasaudiolanguage.Name: Extras Audio Language
extrasaudiolanguage.Description: Set the primary desired language, if not found, fallback to next langauge in the list... (this is a ',' separated list of ISO 639-1 language codes)

extrasformat.Name: Extras Format
extrasformat.Description: For guidence, please see youtube-dl documentation

extrassubtitlelangauge.Name: Extras Subtitle Langauge
extrassubtitlelangauge.Description: Desired Language Code :: For guidence, please see youtube-dl documentation

singletrailer.Name: Single Trailer
singletrailer.Description: true = enabled :: Only downloads the first available trailer, does not apply to other extras type

preferexistingtrailer.Name: Prefer Existing Trailer
preferexistingtrailer.Description: true = enabled :: Checks for existing trailer file, and skips it if found

usefolders.Name: Use Folders
usefolders.Description: true = enabled :: Creates subfolders within the movie folder for extras

endclientcompatibility.Name: End Client Compatibility
endclientcompatibility.Description: plex or emby or jellyfin :: Select the appropriate client for maximum compatibility
